runContractFunction.description: Run a given function of a contract ABI and retrieve readonly data. [Try it with Swagger](https://deep-index.moralis.io/api-docs-2.1/#/Utils/runContractFunction).

queryParams.name: subdomain
queryParams.description: The subdomain of the Moralis server to use (only use when selecting local devchain as chain)

queryParams.name: providerUrl
queryParams.description: The web3 provider URL to use when using local dev chain

queryParams.name: function_name
queryParams.description: The function name of the contract

responses.description: Returns response of the function executed

web3ApiVersion.description: Get the current version of the Moralis Web3 API.

responses.description: Get the current version of the Moralis Web3 API.

endpointWeights.description: Get the cost and rate limit for each API endpoint.

responses.description: The cost and rate limit for each API endpoint.
